item.title: Excess littering to the park, 29th July
item.description:
Hiya I‚Äôve spent an hour clearing litter - I filled a whole black bin liner but there is still much litter around the park - can we have a clean before the weekend? Drug packets and prescription drugs scattered around the childrens play area.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shepherdess Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unfinished rain garden project, 29th July
item.description:
There are two plots of bare earth, now filled with weeds, rubbish and signs of animals digging on Northwold Road - they have been in place for at least 3 months as they supposedly were meant to be rain gardens to improve the local area!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain clogged with earth coming from beneath tree, 29th July
item.description:
Main drain clogged with earth from tree. Emerging beneath kerbstone. Fox digging is moving it out faster, possible sinkhole effect under surrounding pavement slabs. Gaps emerging. Stones falling.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Petworth Street, Battersea, London

item.title: Gainsborough - Fly Tipping Again, 29th July
item.description:
Reporting it here doesn't solve the problem that this is a regular occurrence (once or twice a week).The building employees put the rubbish on the street. Are the residents of Gainsborough exempt from bulk collection fees that the rest of the borough pay?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Poole Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
